metadata.name: MoniScarf "Blue Purple" (NFT + scarf)
metadata.description: NFT created from a SELF-CROCHETED scarf | orig. 125cm/49" wide on top, 135cm/53" across, 80cm/31" core height, 120cm/47" total height | material 100% cotton, weight 200gr=800m (7.05oz=874yds), washable at 30 degree Celsius | main colours are light blue + grass green + purple, colours vary in different light conditions | used stitches: chain stitches, slip stitches, single crochet, double crochet, treble crochet, triple treble crochet | digital version: 4032x3024px | With the NFT, the first owner has the right to claim the physical original of this work. The sales price of the NFT includes worldwide shipping costs and a transportation insurance. If the scarf is not claimed within 6 months after the purchase, it might get destroyed; shipping costs are non-refundable. | All buyer information is treated with the highest confidentiality and discretion. | see https://lynkfire.com/monika for more collections and creations of my NFT journey since July 2021.

attributes.trait_type: physical artwork available for first collector
